definitions.title: n.abstr.
definitions.body: redemption, acc. to LXX SyrVer Vulgate Ges Hi De MV Che Di RVm; then either pl. abstr. sf. year of (my) redemption (so most); or abstr. form. in [[י]]—[[]], after Syr. analogy, Lag:Symm. ii. 101 f. Sem. i. 19, 68. BN 192 (LXX om. my); but < Pt. pass. pl. sf. my ransomed (released) ones Ew Br Brd AV RV cf. sub [[גאל]] supra.
